title: Grouse Grind Hike
description: Looking for fellow UBC students to join me for a hike up the Grouse Grind. Let's enjoy the scenic views together!
location: Grouse Grind Trail, North Vancouver, BC
notes: Please wear appropriate hiking attire and bring water. The trail is approximately 2.5 km with an elevation gain of 800 meters.

title: Axe Throwing Meetup
description: Looking for fellow UBC students interested in a fun evening of axe throwing. No experience necessary!
notes: Safety briefing provided at the start. Wear comfortable clothing.

title: Study Group for MATH 200
description: Seeking study partners for MATH 200. Let's collaborate and prepare for upcoming exams together.
notes: Bring your textbooks and notes. We'll meet in the main study area.
